valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 6 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low 100 miles west of Sole 964 expected Sole 973 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Lundy 969 losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 or gale 8, decreasing 4 to 6. In northeast, easterly 2 to 4.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, becoming moderate or rough. in northeast, slight or moderate.
Weather
In southwest, occasional sleet. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
15:48 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 decreasing gale force 8 soon

South Utsire.text:
Wind
In north, easterly 4 to 6. In south, easterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9.

Visibility
